subject: Franchises
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: The names are eye-catching: Hank Aaron, Jack Kemp, Mario Cuomo. They are board members for Sports Properties Acquisition Corporation, which may someday own a professional franchise.
